nodes.bodyText: remove this line to demonstrate that null is converted to MASTER on round-trip

Please add these ProfileControllerTests:

email validation success when agreementType is NULL
email validation success when agreementType is MASTER
email validation failure when agreementType is RESTRICTED and the email matches domain
email validation failure when agreementType is MASTER and the email does not match domain

Please add these InstitutionServiceTests:

validation success when agreementType is NULL and the contact email matches a domain
something to demonstrate that agreementType is what determines how we validate email, rather than the presence of address or domains.  i.e. don't match against an email address if agreementType is MASTER
there is already a test for that test_emailValidation_mismatch
I will add more for Restricted and NULL
Let's chat on Slack about point 2 here
this is a little confusing.  does the original asdf work?
no since Broad has Restricted agreement
I mean: please change the emailAddresses[] in the test data so it's clear that they refer to people and not institutions
changing name to dua_type to be more consistent with other columns like organization_type
